name: Treehouse Hero
description: You are the mighty hero of the squirrels. The treehouse defender.   Aliens have crash landed in your forest!  Pounce down on them from above atop your mighty treehouse.  Use a wide array of powers such as bombs, freezing, acorn drops and even lightning against the variety of large eyed enemy aliens.  Collect coins and gems as you work your way towards the mighty boss, can you defeat him and his minions? Prepare to be sucked into the addictive world of the tiny but tenacious Treehouse Hero!
